channel.title: 317[pi] Step by step cashe updating?
channel.description:
ok I posted many times asking people to help me figure out what im doing wrong when trying to update my caches so now im gonna tell you step by step what im doing to see if anyone knows what im doing wrong.
1.archive my new cache into .zip (open the new caches highlighting everything in there and archiving that, not the folder itself) 2.uploading to my dropbox 3.going to dropbox click other vertions or w.e it is then rightclick and click copy shortcut (getting the direct dl link) 4.pasting link into web to comfirm it is the direct link to my updated cache (it is the link) 5.opening cachedownloader.java and changing the link of old caches to the new caches. 6.changing the name of old caches to my new name (exactly as link with caps ect.) 7.compiling
then when I run it says it cannot read the folders in the cache cuz there simply not downloading into them I don't understand why cuz when I test the link b4 I add the link it downloads on my desktop and all the files / folders are there but when the client auto downloads them it doesn't download the folders inside.

item.title: 317[pi] Step by step cashe updating?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

are you using the update class or the cachedownloader class?

Read full topic

item.title: 317[pi] Step by step cashe updating?
item.dc:creator: @freddie_griner freddie griner
item.description:
@freddie_griner wrote:

ok I posted many times asking people to help me figure out what im doing wrong when trying to update my caches so now im gonna tell you step by step what im doing to see if anyone knows what im doing wrong.

1.archive my new cache into .zip (open the new caches highlighting everything in there and archiving that, not the folder itself)
2.uploading to my dropbox
3.going to dropbox click other vertions or w.e it is then rightclick and click copy shortcut (getting the direct dl link)
4.pasting link into web to comfirm it is the direct link to my updated cache (it is the link)
5.opening cachedownloader.java and changing the link of old caches to the new caches.
6.changing the name of old caches to my new name (exactly as link with caps ect.)
7.compiling

then when I run it says it cannot read the folders in the cache cuz there simply not downloading into them I don’t understand why cuz when I test the link b4 I add the link it downloads on my desktop and all the files / folders are there but when the client auto downloads them it doesn’t download the folders inside.

Read full topic
